title: request_status Lambda Input (Granule Specific)
description: The output from the request_status Lambda when retrieving status for a particular granule. If multiple jobs match the information given, only the most recent will be returned.

granuleId.description: The unique ID of the granule to retrieve status for.

asyncOperationId.description: The unique ID of the asyncOperation.

files.description: Description and status of the files within the given granule.

fileName.description: The name and extension of the file.

restoreDestination.description: The name of the archive bucket the granule is being copied to.

status.description: The status of the restoration of the file. May be 'pending', 'staged', 'success', or 'failed'.

errorMessage.description: If the restoration of the file errored, the error will be stored here.

requestTime.description: The time, in milliseconds since 1 January 1970 UTC, when the request to restore the granule was initiated.

completionTime.description: The time, in milliseconds since 1 January 1970 UTC, when all files were in an end state.
